answers.answer: While some people are predisposed to be thinner than others, there are some medical conditions that cause people to become underweight.  These can include things like hyperthyroidism, diabetes, enzyme deficiencies that prevent food digestion/absorption, celiac disease, and others.  Also, the effects of stress and medications can't be underestimated.  I think it's a smart idea to continue to pursue this with your doctor. Take care, and be well.
